MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G83 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.40pm to repair an underground cable fault on Cook Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.40pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.57pm on Tuesday 16th February 2021.
